title: My Siblings
description: In case you don't know, I am not the single child.
contents:
That’s my big brother Peter. He is a 5-year-old Japanese Spitz.



My older sister was also once a stray cat. She was brought home when she was only two months old. Back then, she was so skinny that she looked like an ET. Therefore, her name is ET.



My little sister, Huihui, was a Ragdoll. One of my humans’ brothers abandoned her, so she moved to live with my other siblings.

title: 2022 Recent Update
description: I am such a lucky girl I guess.
contents: After staying at the hospital for a weekend, I survived a severe inner ear infection. I had three different kinds of medicine to facilitate my health conditions, but for sure, I was getting better. I even ate three small cans of wet food in only one day after heading back to my home. My humans took good care of me, and now I am kind of back to normal. I am still waiting for an appointment for a follow-up, and I hope everything will be alright.

title: November 2021
description: I traveled from shelter to my new home during the Thanksgiving!
contents: Hi! My name is Twilight! I was born on September 2nd, 2021, and lived as a stray cat for a while before being sent to the shelter. I still remember the moment I met my humans, knowing that was the magic of destiny.
